title: Should I play Teemo
body:
It's always top lane feeding, trolling, afking, etc in my matches. I know all roles can do it but out of my own matches I've seen top lane do it the most. As an ADC and Assassin player I can't really play any normal champ top so I just want to play Teemo or Quinn so I can get some wins. 

Should I just play Teemo and obliterate everyone until I get out of Bronze hell

replies.body: Don't do it because then you'll get mad at your bot lane for going 0/7 at 13 mins
Can't be more infuriating than my top lane doing the same, I haven't seen any ADCs solo 1v5 but I've seen it take my entire team to kill a fed Camille, Yorick, or Jax.
a warden and a arbiter........ wow

> [{quoted}](name=breakordoom444,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2uE3cvos,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-08-26T00:42:34.716+0000)
>
> a warden and a arbiter........ wow

Except I'm *actually* a Teemo main though!

https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Wuks
Yes. Do it. Join the dark side.
If you are in bronze then spam {{champion:122}}
No i played teemo for years hes shit right now. Cant climb at all
